summary: `frontend/src/constants/contact.ts` was updated to the new phone/WhatsApp values, but the diff does not provide evidence that all frontend usages (including the floating WhatsApp button and repo-wide removal of old numbers) were updated/verified. Two additional files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the floating WhatsApp button uses the updated WhatsApp URL with message (via `CONTACT.whatsapp.urlWithMessage`) and opens the chat to the new number.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows updates to `frontend/src/constants/contact.ts`. There is no shown change to the component implementing the floating WhatsApp button (mentioned in summaries as rendered globally in `frontend/src/App.tsx`) to confirm it uses `CONTACT.whatsapp.urlWithMessage` rather than a hardcoded/old URL.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions WhatsAppButton in frontend/src/App.tsx, but no actual code diff)

missing_requirements.requirement: A repo-wide check confirms there are no remaining occurrences of "9888377403" or "919888377403" in frontend source files or user-facing links.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include evidence of a repo-wide search result or updates to all files that might contain hardcoded numbers. Only the constants file is shown updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` to add/track new_feature_requests (AR-1/AR-2) and mark status as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to replace phone numbers across frontend/links; it did not request changes to project tracking/state files.
The BuildRequest did not ask for updating documentation/summaries; only functional replacement of phone/WhatsApp/tel links in the frontend.
